name: Blog Post Generator
description: Create engaging blog posts on any topic
template: Write a comprehensive blog post about {query}. Include an engaging introduction, 3-5 main sections with subheadings, practical examples, and a conclusion with actionable takeaways.

name: Social Media Post
template: Create engaging social media posts about {query}. Each post should be platform-appropriate length, include relevant hashtags, and have a clear call-to-action.

name: Product Description
template: Write a compelling product description for {query}. Highlight key features, benefits, and unique selling points. Include technical specifications if relevant.

name: Code Review
description: Get detailed code reviews and suggestions
template: Review the following code related to {query} for best practices, performance, security issues, and maintainability. Provide specific suggestions for improvement.

name: Debug Helper
description: Identify and fix bugs in your code
template: Help me debug this issue: {query}. Explain what's causing the error and provide a fix with detailed explanation.

name: API Documentation
template: Create comprehensive API documentation for {query}. Include request/response examples, parameters, error codes, and usage notes.

name: Email Campaign
template: Create an email campaign for {query}. Each email should include: compelling subject line, engaging opening, value proposition, and clear CTA.

name: Landing Page Copy
template: Write landing page copy for {query}. Include: attention-grabbing headline, subheadline, benefit-focused sections, social proof elements, objection handling, and persuasive CTA.

name: Press Release
template: Write a professional press release for {query}. Include: compelling headline, dateline, lead paragraph with key info, quotes from stakeholders, company boilerplate, and contact information.

name: Study Guide
template: Create a detailed study guide for {query}. Include: key concepts, definitions, examples, practice questions with answers, and memory aids.

name: ELI5 Explanation
template: Explain {query} like I'm five years old. Use simple analogies, everyday examples, and avoid jargon. Make it engaging and easy to understand while maintaining accuracy.

name: Step-by-Step Tutorial
template: Create a step-by-step tutorial for {query}. Include: prerequisites, required materials/tools, numbered steps with clear instructions, tips for common mistakes, and troubleshooting advice.

name: YouTube Script
template: Write a YouTube video script about {query}. Include: hook (first 10 seconds), introduction, main content with timestamps, call-to-action, and outro.

name: Video Storyboard
description: Plan your video shot by shot
template: Create a detailed storyboard for a video about {query}. Include: scene descriptions, camera angles, transitions, dialogue/voiceover notes, and visual elements for each shot.

name: Short Video Concept
template: Generate creative short-form video concepts about {query}. Each concept should include: hook, visual style, key moments, text overlays, and trending audio suggestions.
